snippet: Israeli forces arrested 20 members of the Palestinian militant group Hamas, including three lawmakers, in a raid early Monday in the West Bank, Hamas officials said.
abstract: Israeli forces arrest 20 members of Palestinian militant group Hamas, including three lawmakers, during raid in West Bank.
lead_paragraph: Israeli forces arrested 20 members of the Palestinian militant group Hamas, including three lawmakers, in a raid early Monday in the West Bank, Hamas officials said.

headline.seo: 20 Members of Hamas Are Arrested in the West Bank
headline.main: Israel: 20 Members of Hamas Are Arrested in the West Bank
headline.print_headline: Israel: 20 Members of Hamas Are Arrested in the West Bank
